last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Tree of Life faces destruction, the fate of Ilanga lies in the hands of Ntsiki — ready to embrace her true identity as the Brave One.

name: The Brave Ones
overview: An all-mighty goddess reincarnated as a young woman must harness her divine powers to avenge her sister's death and protect her family from destruction.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: As her sister resists their eviction, Ntsiki dreams of a better life — unaware that tragedy awaits. Ayanda seeks a magical entity to save her dying son.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ntsiki and Nkosi demand justice while their family crumbles in mourning. Ayanda and Luthando plot their next move as Ntsiki discovers her own abilities.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ntsiki's powers catch Nosisa's eye while Nkosi's protest brings trouble. With the bracelets in her possession, Ayanda prepares to do the unthinkable.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ntsiki learns a terrible truth about Siya as she races to free Nkosi from captivity. Ayanda turns to an estranged family member for help.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ntsiki’s search for guidance leads to shocking revelations. Mcebo confronts Siya over their father’s fate as Ayanda and Luthando look for Ntsiki.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the Tree of Life faces destruction, the fate of Ilanga lies in the hands of Ntsiki — ready to embrace her true identity as the Brave One.
